user_query: I want to explore the history of pageant contests and need a comprehensive list of all the pageant contests that have taken place. Can you provide me with a list of all the pageant contests? Furthermore, I'm interested in knowing the details of the winner of the contest that took place in 1987.

TaskList.description: Gather a comprehensive list of all pageant contests that have taken place.
Retrieve the details of the winner of the pageant contest that took place in 1987.
